sources.title: Ride 'Em Cowboy (1942)
sources.description: Two peanut vendors at a rodeo show get in trouble with their boss and hide out on a railroad train heading west. They get jobs as cowboys on a dude ranch, despite the fact that neither of them knows anything about cowboys, horses, or anything else. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/ride-em-cowboy-1942/

metadata.Plot: Two peanut vendors at a rodeo show get in trouble with their boss and hide out on a railroad train heading west. They get jobs as cowboys on a dude ranch, despite the fact that neither of them knows anything about cowboys, horses, or anything else.
metadata.Writer: Edmund L. Hartmann, Harold Shumate, True Boardman
metadata.Actors: Bud Abbott, Lou Costello, Dick Foran
